Ontario's Aging at Home strategy might provide funding for modifications or additional help. Also, check with local seniors' centers or the Ontario Caregiver Organization for emotional support resources. Financially, to protect their house, explore property tax relief programs for seniors or reverse mortgages through approved lenders. I recommend contacting your local Home and Community Care office for a free assessment.
